column4: what vmWare program should I download if I want to run Ubuntu on top of Windows? (fusion, player, server, workstation....).
with Windows as host hmm not that great, not that great at all,  could be useful for getting a feel for Ubuntu though
Virtualbox, VMware, player, VMware server,  or  Microsoft Virtualpc which probably isn't that Linux friendly

why is it not that great at all?, I have used linux for years, but I have to install Ubuntu Feisty because an old program I developed does not work perfectly in Ubuntu Jaunty. I don't want to create a partition only for Feisty and I tried to install Ubuntu Feisty with persistent changes  but failed miserably.
